securityImplications: Attackers might use UpdateIPSet to modify IP address rules, potentially allowing unauthorized access from IPs they control.
commandLineSimulation: aws wafv2 update-ip-set --name testip --scope REGIONAL --id a1b2c3d4-5678-90ab-cdef-EXAMPLE11111 --addresses 198.51.100.0/16 --lock-token 447e55ac-2396-4c6d-b9f9-86b67c17f8b5
